commands.mpirun: -np 2 -x LD_LIBRARY_PATH=$LD_LIBRARY_PATH --mca pml ucx --mca btl ^openib -x CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES=0 -x UCX_RNDV_SCHEME=get_zcopy -x UCX_NET_DEVICES=mlx5_0:1 -x UCX_TLS=rc,shm -x NCCL_SOCKET_IFNAME=ib0 -x LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/usr/local/lib:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH --bind-to none -x NCCL_DEBUG=INFO --mca plm_base_verbose 100 --map-by slot --mca orte_base_help_aggregate 0 $TEST -d managed
